naslov: POLOVICA DVOJČKA CENTAR BRIBIR, Bribir, Vinodolska Općina (prodaja)
opis: PRODAJA – Polovica dvojčka, Bribir (150 m od centra) Prodaje se polovica dvojčka (godina izgradnje 1980.), koja uključuje stan s ukupnom stambenom površinom od 100 m², na mirnoj lokaciji samo 150 m od centra Bribira. Idealna za stanovanje ili turistički najam. Link na video: https://youtu.be/qZ8Mn4jtt4g Parcela od 800 m² – mogućnost izgradnje bazena, ljetne kuhinje, vrta, parkirališta Stan – 3 spavaće sobe, kuhinja s blagovaonicom, kupaonica, dodatni WC i terasa Krov: valovitka, prozori: drveni s kapcima, djelomično PVC (dvoslojni) Podne obloge: keramika, parket, podno grijanje Potpuna privatnost, otvoren pogled na dolinu prema moru Novog Vinodolskog Uređena dokumentacija – građevinska i uporabna dozvola Samo nekoliko minuta vožnje do Crikvenice, Novog Vinodolskog i mora Kuća je funkcionalna i useljiva, potrebna je djelomična obnova za postizanje punog potencijala. Izvrsna investicijska prilika na popularnoj turističkoj destinaciji! Kontakt: Nataša Poljanec – licenca br. 3061 24nep d.o.o. Ljubljanska ulica 87, 2000 Maribor Tel.: +386 (0)40 501 553 _________________________________________________________________________________________________________________ SALE – Semi-detached house unit, Bribir (150 m from the center) For sale: a semi-detached house unit (built in 1980) with a total living area of 100 m², located in a quiet area just 150 m from the center of Bribir. Ideal for residential living or tourist rental. Video link: https://youtu.be/qZ8Mn4jtt4g Plot of 800 m² – potential for a pool, outdoor kitchen, garden, parking Apartment – 3 bedrooms, kitchen with dining area, bathroom, additional toilet, and terrace Roof: corrugated, windows: wooden with shutters, partially PVC (double-glazed) Flooring: ceramic tiles, parquet, underfloor heating Complete privacy, open view of the valley towards the sea in Novi Vinodolski Complete documentation – building and usage permits Just a few minutes’ drive to Crikvenice, Novi Vinodolski, and the sea The house is functional and move-in ready, requiring partial renovation to reach its full potential. An excellent investment opportunity in a popular tourist destination! Contact: Nataša Poljanec – license no. 3061 24nep d.o.o. Ljubljanska ulica 87, 2000 Maribor Tel.: +386 (0)40 501 553
